original_text: They began to offer those burnt offerings on the first day of the seventh month. That was before they had started to build the temple.
korean_text: 일곱째 달 초하루부터 비로소 여호와께 번제를 드렸으나 그 때에 여호와의 성전 지대는 미처 놓지 못한지라

sentences.original_text: They began to offer those burnt offerings
on the first day of the seventh month
they had started to build the temple
